task.title: Veggie Day
task.description: Eat only vegetarian meals today.

task.title: Local Only
task.description: Buy only regional food today.

task.title: Animal-Free
task.description: Avoid all animal products today.

task.title: Leftover Chef
task.description: Cook only with leftovers today.

task.title: Tap Water Only
task.description: Drink only tap water today.

task.title: Zero Packaging
task.description: Buy only unpackaged fruits & veggies.

task.title: Snack Smart
task.description: Avoid packaged snacks today.

task.title: Organic Meal
task.description: Eat at least one fully organic meal today.

task.title: Meal Planning
task.description: Plan your meals for the week today.

task.title: Food Talk
task.description: Explain to someone why sustainable eating matters.

task.title: Walk the Short Way
task.description: Walk all distances under 3 km today.

task.title: Bike Mode
task.description: Do everything by bike today.

task.title: Car-Free Day
task.description: Don’t use a car today.

task.title: Public Transport
task.description: Use bus or train today.

task.title: Carpool
task.description: Organize a carpool today.

task.title: Multi-Stop Route
task.description: Combine errands into one trip today.

task.title: Explore on Foot
task.description: Visit a new place on foot instead of using a vehicle.

task.title: Mobility Check
task.description: Calculate your mobility footprint today.

task.title: Future Commute
task.description: Plan a more eco-friendly way to get to school or work.

task.title: Share a Tip
task.description: Share a sustainable transport tip online or with a friend.

task.title: Quick Shower
task.description: Take a shower no longer than 3 minutes.

task.title: Standby Off
task.description: Turn off all standby electronics.

task.title: Cook With a Lid
task.description: Use a lid when cooking today.

task.title: 30 Degrees Only
task.description: Wash your laundry at max 30 °C today.

task.title: Natural Light
task.description: Don’t use artificial lighting during the day.

task.title: Unplugged
task.description: Unplug all chargers after use.

task.title: Offline Hour
task.description: One hour with no electricity use.

task.title: Air Smart
task.description: Air out your room with short bursts instead of leaving windows open.

task.title: Energy Scanner
task.description: Find your biggest energy waster today.

task.title: Skip the Dryer
task.description: Let your laundry air dry today.

task.title: No Shopping
task.description: Don't buy anything today.

task.title: Fix It
task.description: Repair something instead of throwing it away.

task.title: Plastic-Free
task.description: Avoid all single-use products today.

task.title: Recycle It
task.description: Recycle glass, paper, or batteries today.

task.title: Bring a Bag
task.description: Use your own shopping bag today.

task.title: Go Secondhand
task.description: Visit a secondhand shop or platform today.

task.title: Borrow Instead
task.description: Borrow or lend an item today.

task.title: No Online Shopping
task.description: Avoid all online purchases today.

task.title: Zero Waste Day
task.description: Try to produce zero waste today.

task.title: Show Your Favorite
task.description: Post a product you've been using sustainably for a long time.

task.title: 15 Minutes Outside
task.description: Spend at least 15 minutes in nature today.

task.title: Clean-Up
task.description: Pick up 5 pieces of litter outdoors.

task.title: Plant Something
task.description: Plant a seed, flower, or herb today.

task.title: No Distractions
task.description: Take a walk without phone or music.

task.title: Nature Journal
task.description: Write down 3 things you appreciate about nature.

task.title: Offline Outdoors
task.description: Spend one hour outdoors without any digital devices.

task.title: Observe Nature
task.description: Consciously watch animals or plants today.

task.title: Learn Something
task.description: Read about a threatened ecosystem.

task.title: Meditate in Nature
task.description: Meditate outside for 5 minutes today.

task.title: Nature Buddy
task.description: Invite someone to a nature walk.
